title.rendered: Rhino4x4 3D Evolution Front Winch Bar – TOYOTA HILUX 2021+

content.rendered:
Rhino4x4 3D Evolution Front Winch Bar – TOYOTA HILUX 2021+

The Rhino4x4 Hilux winch bar is the start of Rhino’s new Evolution 3D range of bars, and its even better than their last! These new bars give your vehicle an aggressive 4wd look without looking like a truck. They are a tough 3 and 5mm all steel construction and protect all of your engine vitals. They also give you full winch compatibility, 2 rated recovery points, market leading angle of approach, and a heavy duty bash plate all as standard.

The Evolution Bumper is finished in a hard-wearing flat black Powder coat or can be colour coded as an option. All Rhino’s parts are now zinc plated before powder coating to ensure a long rust free life. They are a 3mm and 6mm steel construction and includes as standard a 5mm Aluminium bash plate not offered on other brands. The middle winch plate insert comes standard in Black or can be optioned as stainless steel or colour coded with the rest of the bar. Rhino also offer as standard, LED foglights which are an extra on many other brands.

The Evolution bumper has carried out many dynamic crash tests here in Australia to ensure it complements the existing safety systems, for example Air bags. The Standard bumper on your vehicle gets removed completely and can be saved / sold.

The bar suits the wide body Hilux or narrow body with aftermarket flares.

Includes: The below are included items that are charged as extra on other brands Winch mount (no additional brackets required)

  • Integrated LED Fog lights
  • 5mm Aluminium Bash / Protection plate (Not just a thin short stone shield)
  • 2 x Vehicle recovery points
  • Hinged number plate bracket to access winch area / Fairlead

Optional:

  • Can be colour coded to your vehicle specification
  • Middle winch plate insert can be optioned as stainless steel
  • Shackles
  • Winch
  • Spotlight bar
  • Spotlights

To browse our full range of products to suit your Hilux, CLICK HERE!

OR

Click here to check out our full range of Rhino4x4 products!

For more 4×4 inspiration, follow us on Instagram and Facebook

excerpt.rendered: The Rhino 4X4 Evolution 3D Winch Bar for the 2021+ Toyota Hilux is available for order now at Automax 4X4.
